blogPost.excerpt: Now sales, marketing, and finance operators can crush KPIs with machine learning. Our easy-to-use, powerful, and affordable ML platform guides you from data to live predictions in 5 minutes. No code or data science expertise needed.

localize.description: 現在，銷售、營銷和財務操作員可以通過機器學習粉碎KPI。我們的ML平臺簡單易用、功能強大、價格合理，可在5分鐘內指導您從數據到實時預測。無需代碼或數據科學專業知識。
